location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 4573/45 'Sardar Ahmad Wale Jar. Transit Visa for India.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains telegrams regarding procuring a transit visa for Sardar Ahmad Wale Jan, an Afghan national, from the Political Department in order to travel to India.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
